instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3462 ASD Error SMC I0 Failed
threads.message: [B]Hi Guys a customer brought in a macbook pro early 2013, the problem in the fans are spinning at max speed. I checked the board signs of water damage, and none so i ran the internet asd and got error 4SNS/1/C0000008: Ts0P--124. Then i ran the asd efi mode and got error( SMC I0 Failed )any ideas on where too look from here.[/B]

threads.title: 820-3462 ASD Error SMC I0 Failed
threads.message: Is thermal sensor in the trackpad. I bet corroded flatcable/connector to trackpad.

threads.title: 820-3462 ASD Error SMC I0 Failed
threads.message: Hi Duke, turns out it was something with the camera. i replaced the trackpad had same problem, turns out the smc camera and trackpad run on the same line. so when i unplugged the camera fans started to spin at normal speed its a retina display and it looked distorted so i gave it back to the customer to replace it with a good lcd set up.

threads.title: 820-3462 ASD Error SMC I0 Failed
threads.message: It is actually the ALS. You can cut the data lines at the camera connector. Camera will still work, just no ALS anymore.
